about_the_game:
Daily Driven Racer is about racing everyday cars, or sleeper cars, on uniquely designed tracks. Each track has a different look and feel, providing a fresh experience every time. The driving mechanics blend arcade fun with simulation realism, ensuring that both casual and hardcore racing fans can enjoy the game.

Single Player Features:

Grand Tour Mode: Participate in a series of races and progress as you win each race to conquer the tour.

Circuit Race: Compete against AI opponents in various tracks.

Sprint Race: Race against AI in short, point to point races.

Racer Duel: Face off in 1v1 challenges against AI opponents.

Time Trial: Race against yourself to achieve the best time.

Split-Screen Multiplayer:

Play with up to 4 players in local split-screen for more excitement and fun.

Circuit Race: Compete against players, AI opponents, or a combination of both.

Sprint Race: Race against players, AI, or a combination of both.

Cops and Robbers Mode: One player takes on the role of the cop while the other plays as the robber in exciting chases.

Battle Mode: Engage in vehicular combat and be the last car standing with a unique jump-to-win mechanic.

Cruise: free roam with friends with no specific objective.

Vehicles and Tracks:

Start with 12 cars and unlock 8 additional ones, making a total of 20 cars.

Race on 13 different, uniquely designed tracks.

Other Features:

Immediate Next Race: Enjoy a seamless experience with quick transitions to the next level, ensuring non-stop fun after completing each race.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: DDR is about racing everyday cars, or sleeper cars, on unique tracks, each offering a fresh experience. Enjoy various game modes in Single Player and Split Screen. The Simcade driving style ensures fun for both casual and hardcore players. Play with 2-4 players in local split-screen for maximum fun!
